Text: WARNING!! This has those F**King Swedish subtitles BURNED into the whole movie! They are destroying all the movies put up on these torrent sites. AND to make matters worse, they put the subtitles INSIDE the movie! This one is about 1 inch from the middle of the screen, on the lower portion! Some put it in the black at the bottom, but not this jerk! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
Thanks for the heads up.  I have no desire to learn to read swedish while watching a movie with english audio.  Any movie with SWESUBS is garbage.  Mininova has a proper version.
